name: Bubble Shooter League
description:
Play for FUN or play for REAL CASH PRIZES! Can you pop your way to the top?

Get ready for the ultimate bubble blast with a tournament twist! Put your bubble popping skills to the test, with rapid fire 1 vs 1 match-ups against players from around the world and WIN REAL CASH prizes!

Be the best you can be, using accuracy and speed to climb to the top of Bubble Shooter League! Has there ever been a better way to kill time and earn money?

Once you pop you won’t stop!
- A simple and fun competitive twist on the classic bubble shooter game you love!
- Shoot and pop as many bubbles as you can in 3-minute bite-size head to head matches!
- Compete in tournaments for play for real cash and other prizes!
- Rookie or pro, be matched with opponents based on your skill level!

Sign up today and start earning cash!!

Note: Cash tournaments are available in about 75% of the world. Cash tournaments are not enabled in the following U.S. states: AZ, AR, CT, DE, FL, LA, MD, MT, SC, SD, and TN. If you don't live in a cash-enabled region, you can still play for fun with our virtual currency.

If you have any questions about the Skillz system or cash tournaments please contact: support@skillz.com
